calculatorName: ACTION ICU Score for Intensive Care in NSTEMI

cases.description: Lowest possible score - young, normal labs/vitals, no HF, no ST depression, prior revasc
cases.source: Fanaroff AC, et al. JAHA. 2018;7(11). Age<70 (0) + Cr<1.1 (0) + HR<85 (0) + SBP>=145 (0) + Trop<12x (0) + No HF (0) + No ST dep (0) + Prior revasc (0) = 0.

cases.description: Low risk - age >=70, no prior revasc, otherwise normal
cases.source: Fanaroff AC, et al. JAHA. 2018. Age>=70 (+1) + No prior revasc (+1) = 2.

cases.description: Moderate risk - age >=70, creatinine >=1.1, HR 85-100, SBP 125-145, no prior revasc
cases.source: Fanaroff AC, et al. JAHA. 2018. Age (+1) + Cr (+1) + HR (+1) + SBP (+1) + No revasc (+1) + ST dep (+1) = 6.

cases.description: High risk - heart failure present plus multiple risk factors
cases.source: Fanaroff AC, et al. JAHA. 2018. Age (+1) + HF (+5) + HR>=100 (+3) + SBP<125 (+3) = 12.

cases.description: Maximum score - all risk factors maximized
cases.source: Fanaroff AC, et al. JAHA. 2018. Age (+1) + Cr (+1) + HR>=100 (+3) + SBP<125 (+3) + Trop>=12x (+2) + HF (+5) + ST dep (+1) + No revasc (+1) = 17.
